Murcia Tapas


The Spain’s smallest place and least known regions are renowned all over Spain for it’s good and delicious tapas. Many tapas recipes originate from this region and many bars and restaurant offer mind-boggling selection of traditional Murcian tapas and local dishes.

Here are the few Tapas that originate in Murcia:
Roasted vegetables with serrano ham
Oyster mushrooms in almond sauce
Scrambled eggs with bacon and chorizo
Lemon artichokes
San Jacobos
Fritters
Spicy kebabs
Olives in a herb sauce
Fried anchovies

The traditional tapas and local dishes are one of the most tourist’s favorite in the place. Some tourists and locals said “Murcian travel is incomplete without Murcian tapas”. Hotels such as Siete Coronas Murcia , fancy and ordinary restaurant, the Murcian culinary are still practicing and serving the traditional dishes of their city.

More information
Hotel 4 Estrellas Murcia

National Art Museum of Catalonia


Museu Nacional d’Art de Catalunya , abbreviated as MNAC, it is a museum of Catalan Visual art located in Barcelona, Spain. Built for 1929 World’s fair, situated on the Montjuic hill and rehabilitated by the 1992 Summer Olympic.

The museum was created in 1990, when the Catalonian Museum Law reunited the collections of the former Catalunian Art Museum and the Modern Art Museum and declared it as National Museum. The architectural design of the museum is a combination of classical and Modern Spanish Art. It was opened in 1995, with the Romasque Art section. The Gothic Art section was opened on 199, while the Renaissance, Barocque, 19th and 20th century collections was opened on 2000. The official opening with the building completely rehabilitated and all the collection in place was on 2004.

The original Museu d’Art de Catalunya was opened on 1934 on the same place as today, but was closed during the Spanish Civil War.

Since 2004, the museum accommodates lots of Spanish Arts to display. It is the sign that Spanish arts still continue and always following the Spanish traditions,

This Museum is one of the most tourist favourite of Barcelona. It is indeed a beautiful work of art building, very impressive piece. Millions of tourist very year loves to witness the beautiful display of Spanish art.

Discover Bilbao

Bilbao is the largest city in the Basque country, a north side of Spain. This city is one of the most economically and industrially active city of Spain with 354,145 inhabitant the almost half of the population of the whole Basque country.
The tourism industry in the place is really active. Guggenheim Bilbao Museum, Zubizuri bridge, Euskalduna Palace are the few main tourist favorite spot, Mercado Antiguo Lavadero (Old Market), the Plaza Circular, the Plaza Moyua and the Plaza de Miguel de Unamuno, where you can soak up Bilbao's historic character and charm.. Just take a Bilbao map and discover all the charm of the Biscay capital. With its galleries, theatres and monuments Bilbao is the perfect destination for modern history and art lovers.
If you remember the movie “The world is not enough” a James bond film, the city of Bilbao is the place where the actions happened.

Tenerife experience

Having a vacation in one of the major tourist destination of the world is quite great experience especially when you are from very stressing works in whole year. If you are in this place mean you are one of the 1,600,000 average tourist visitors a year. If you want to have fun with other people, yes this place is full with that.
Travel and to have a relaxation is a really a necessity that everyone must have, experience other places away from everyday life, meet some new friend, meet some relatives, family bonding and company bonding. Crazy moments, bar hopping, nice hotels, sightseeings and beach activities are package in this place. Aside from tourist activities, the views and the beauty that this place possessed is extremely good. Well, it quite cost a until your pocket to empty if you are not wise, anyway, lets not talk about expenses and money, just google how to avail cheap travel.
One place that I already familiar is the Playa de las Americas, one of the famous place in the island. A resort are features numerous bars and nightclubs as well as number of beaches. Most of the beaches are man-made from imported sand from Africa due to the darkness of the native volcanic sand. To make my story short, this place is really amazing.
Shopping in this area for travel provision is not a problem, holiday supermarket in Tenerife are just in the distance from our place, one of the cheap shop in the island. Cheap transportations, cheap hotels are in this place makes more affordable to enjoy more the place.

Alameda del Boulevard

The hub of San Sebastian’s life is the tamarisk –shaded alameda del boulevard with its shops, restaurants and cafes. If you are in San Sebastian, surely you can’t miss with this place. Shopping’s and leisure are in this place. Bars and restaurant are fantastic, this is one of the tourist favorite place especially tourist enjoying nightlife. In the west end are the fishing harbor, the Club Nautico and the town hall, the west front overlooks the Bahia de la Concha with its beach.

During San Sebastian summer season, especially during the height of the season, this place is full of people from different countries enjoying the place. This time also the best hotels and accommodation become booked-up and hotels increase the price as availability reduces. Hoteles San Sebastian , car hire, restaurants and cafes are really busy that time serving the locals and the foreign visitors.

Hotel Centro San Sebastian

Travel tips


Everyone knows that travel is really cost sometimes a huge amount of dollar. This undeniable fact can be a barrier why people sometimes get rid of travel even they are in their vacation time or holidays. Some say, it is for the budget sake, avoid expenses, in the other side its true. Financial problem is really a headache nowadays. But wait; there are people in this planet that they really love travel or some because it is really important to them. I made this travel tip for everyone because I know everyone loves travel, If you are a traveler or not, I hope this tip is really a help.

This tip is from my experience and shared from the fellow traveler about travel in cheapest way.

First key to budget travel is to plan ahead. Organized the places and activities you want to experience.

Planning and spending travel dollar wisely is a priority for most families. Don’t forget to check the availability of budget, spending the budget wise make the travel more enjoyable. If not, you surely stranded.

Be simple and avoid extra things that not so important. Even if your travel budget is so tight, it doesn’t mean that you can’t enjoy the travel.

Be aware that small things can be add up with a huge amount. Hotel extras, restaurant, car rentals, gas, ticket for special attractions, drinks add-on makes your budget goes crazy.

Make sure that you always focus of the things you want to enjoy your travel. Things to learn, peoples to meet, views to see, adventure to experience is the basic thing in travel that is very important to make your travel become a real travel.

Hotel Villa de Avilés
Hotel San Sebastian

My experience in Barcelona

Last year during summer, one of Hotel Centro Barcelona were we checked in waiting for two days after our conference starts. Since it’s about two days in waiting, with the excitements with my company has, we decided to roam around the city. Well, experiencing a place like Barcelona is really awesome. I live in London but this city is really good. Nightlife, tequila, hotels are awesome. One that I impressed most is the landmarks, the architectures that contain historical backgrounds, landmarks that they preserve for many centuries.

Barcelona bars and pubs


This is a city know for its nightlife, so it comes as no surprise that there is a huge variety of bars and pubs covering pretty much every theme and appealing to all tastes and budgets.
There are all kinds of bars in Barcelona. Some have a small dance floor, some a small restaurant and some have live music. Barcelona bars are usually opened until 2-3am, although late licensed bars stay open until the metro starts running again at 5am can also be found.
Oferta Hoteles Barcelona , some have bars and restaurant that serving the tourists want to experience nightlife and taste the Spanish wine and Spanish traditional foods. There are plenty Irish/English pubs with good Guinness and usually English speaking bar staff, each with particular atmosphere and often also offering quiz nights, language exchanges and live gigs.

Valentines Day gift

Make sure you get your sweetheart some totally awesome gifts. A gift were perfect that she really impressed, no matter what its cost, just refer to your instinct how you know the likes of your love one. Most and common gift of that day is the heart-shaped stuff (chocolates, gifts, cake and flowers). First is, not so very traditional, be yourself first in making and decide what to give. I mean, you are a perfect gift in the heart of your love, from you is another special gift to her, gets?
Valentines day is a sweet time for couples but it is often negative elements and luxury and consumerism. Diamond, fancy jewelries, fancy restaurant are really excessive consumptions of the holiday can lean towards damaging budgets. Let’s try to make it more simple and practical.
Out of town gift is one of the perfect gifts that you can manipulate all elements-the budget. Going to a place like Salamanca are really nice gift for a lover who wants privacy. I was in Hoteles Salamanca before and my valentines are perfect. Privacy, nice views, cheap restaurants, bars are enough to celebrate valentines.
Giving flowers are common but you can make it more romantic by hiring el mariachi. Music is romantic; I bet your girl surely weakened the knee if you do that.
Candle light dinner, it is common but is still effective. You have your own world with a single candle as light, all you can see it the twinkling eyes of your love one staring at you.

There’s a lots of gift, millions of them but except appliances.

Leon, Spain

If you are cultural related traveler, this place is perfect for you, Leon, Spain. Leon is one of the most historic regions of Old Castile. There are few remains have been found here but there is evidence of Roman occupation. Other people here settled here including the moors. Well, there are many facts in this city related to the history of the city as well as the history of the Country.
One of the Leon s glories is without doubts, the Cathedral, one of the finest in Europe and having been constructed from the 13the century for a period of 200 years to completion. The unique architectural design of the building is one of the attractions that every tourist is really amazed. No other building constructed like the cathedral in Leon.
Like in Barcelona, most of the building was made like in 50’s or 60’s architectural features, even Hoteles de Barcelona is has the same features. Same in the City of Leon, it is really amazing, Hotel Leon and other structures in the city is like a part of the history of the place and the culture of the people of Leon and the whole Spain.

Antoni Gaudi



Antoni Gaudi was Spanish Catalan Architect who belonged to the Modernist style movement and was famous for his unique and highly individualistic designs. His works has a huge contribution in Spanish culture, one of the historical men the Spanish history.

Gaudí was a devout Catholic, to the point that in his later years, he abandoned secular work and devoted his life to Catholicism and his Sagrada Família. He designed it to have 18 towers, 12 for the 12 apostles, 4 for the 4 evangelists, one for Mary and one for Jesus.

Gaudí's first works were designed in the style of gothic architecture and traditional Catalan architectural modes, but he soon developed his own distinct sculptural style. French architect Eugene Viollet-le-Duc, who promoted an evolved form of gothic architecture, proved a major influence on Gaudí. But the student surpassed the master architect and contrived highly original designs – irregular and fantastically intricate. Some of his greatest works, most notably La Sagrada Família, have an almost hallucinatory power.

Even it is unfinished, the Sagrada Familia is one of the landmarks of the country and the tourist spot that every tourist who visit Barcelona can’t afford to miss the work of the famous Architect. The project of Sagrada Familia is scheduled to be completed in 2026.

The contribution of Gaudi in architectural designs are gain huge amount to the heart of every Spanish people. Most of the architectural designs of the city buildings are inspired in the works of Gaudi, Educational structures, Hotel Playa Barcelona and other architectural works.

Can you trust travel sites?


People who don’t have all the time in the world to plan thoroughly their next ventured trip usually resort to travel site resources, but the question is “can trust this sites”? There is no best answer of this old question; others are accurate and reliable but the others can be a plain fraud and only aim to deceive you by naming all kinds of details in the location you want to visit. It is important to be careful

Most travel sites can give you best prices for various destinations, provide you valuable suggestion on where to go and teach you the ideal place to shop, lead you to terrific hotels such as Hoteles en Bilbao or any tourist services, and most of all guides you to where you can devour the best food stuff that will surely satisfy you. Anyhow you can take advantage of these free travel guides. Be careful to those who have “business means business” mentality. Most of this is just exaggerating on their commercial purpose; that’s why we should be careful.

Just be flexible in any ways. If you are smart traveler, be vigilant in the things around you. Be more curious in examining the site you want to inquire and check it reputation in the online community. I have personally known sites of Reservas Hoteles , good reputations and has a great experience in travel services, specially in accommodation services. Flexibility and be smart is a tools to have good travel and time. Also, don’t be so mechanical in travel plan, it is not necessary to have plan in any details, make also a room for any chances and ordinary opportunities. Go with flow and you can realize what the meaning of true adventure is.

Tasting Traditional Food: way of learning cultures



One of the fun ways of learning Spanish Culture is learning its traditional food. The Spanish have a rich culinary traditions and eating in a Spanish restaurant will offer you both gastronomic delight as well as a chance to learn Spanish way of life. Like if you are in Valencia, Spain and aiming to lean the Valencia Cultures, you must visit Restaurantes Valencia to try on yourself the taste and the way of Valencia living. It is not much too complicated, just feel it and observe then you appreciate what I meant. It is not just tasting the food, it include also the communications and learning the language, the terms and the Spanish table manner.

Madrid, the big city of Spain is also one of the famous because of the gastronomy, traditional food that reflect the Spanish way of life. Restaurantes Madrid , most of them served the Spain different traditional food, if you are a Culinary traveler and wants to learn Spanish culture, Madrid is one of the recommended place for you. Food and how they made is one of the biggest part in the culture.

Europe Nice places for summer


The knockout views of the popular cities in Europe are a major tourist’s destination. Awesome hotspots, good road network and a welcoming relax atmosphere are only a minor part of what is yet to be discovered of this wonderful continent. Traveling in a place like Paris and London sure you summer vacation is really perfect.

Paris, a widely know because of its charming destination. Provence, Loire Valley, Rhone Valley, Bordeaux and Bretagne are the perfect place. The country is also famous of it s wine, cheese, croissants, chateaux and lavender fields.

Like in Spain, London on the other hand has a imperial architecture, much to be liking of some Hoteles en Barcelona . They have a taste for fine literature and world-class music. They also make one of the world’s most scrumptious chocolates. The must visit places included Stratford, Oxford, York and Manchester.

About Spain, it competes well along these indeed beautiful European Cities. Barcelona, aside from their beautiful beaches, the city is also a home of luxurious Hotel Barcelona , one of the world’s finest Hotels.

Master of Medicine: Fostering Stability


There are lots of Master programs that being offered by various Universities like Masters España and other learning institution. The most common programs are Master in Business Management, Master en Marketing , Master in Finance. Most of this programs are business related but there is one of its kind program related to medicine, Master in Medicine of which established internationally to create a modular approach to medical area. It is a program that provides PhD candidates serious and more exposure to clinical medicine. The driving principle of this program involves specialization on Renal Medicine, intensive Medical care, effective medical training, medical research, medical methods and medical ethics. The program integrates also with different social draws in order to maximized students and interested professionals with effective medical learning. The program doesn’t just focus on medical research and medicinal studies, students in this program where also introduce to latest medical gadgets that will be very useful in their specialized field. Aside from the latest gadgets, students will also gain new knowledge about operational medications such as medical surgeries and transplantations. The students will also be exposing to laboratory activities and experimentations that may help them become effective scientist and doctors.

Tourist bus is enough to see the City of Barcelona

Transport metropolitan de Barcelona responds the opinion of those people who consider that there are few better ways of acquainting yourself with a new city. These “hop on, hop off” buses gives you the ideal opportunity of getting your first glimpse of all the major and perhaps bringing your attention to somewhere you hadn’t previously considered exploring. Tourist bus and other car hire in some of Hoteles Barcelona Centro is undoubtedly one of the best of its kind in Spain as it offers so much more than a sightseeing trip.

Hotel en Barcelona , tourist place and restaurant become easier to the tourist to access. Wherever they plan to visit in the city, beach, tourist spot, adventure, this kind of offer is really a big help and makes the tourism in Barcelona become more lovable than before.

Easy way to find your MBA


Better way to learn about a county and places is to visit it. Visits is aren’t always about business and pleasure, sometimes it’s more than that. If you need to jumpstart your master degree program, Spain can offer opportunities for that. EMBA list you will find equally good school that provide outstanding education. For a starter, its never been easier to get around. Opportunities knock and you should do your part to play it. The assurance you have is the caliber you have in the world after fulfilling your MBA

Adventure in Andorra


Do you know that Andorra has total 3,075 hectares of skiing area? With the facilities of 282 kilometer of pistes, 106 ski lifts and 1,417 artificial snow cannons, the adventurous tourist surely love this place.
Basically, Andorra is a country of adventure. In summer, the mountain stations of Grandvalira, Naturlandia-La Rabassa and Vallnord offer a wide range of activities for enjoying the fresh air and discovering new sensations. Aside from being adventure land, Andorra is a city destination offering interesting reflections from both French and Spanish cultures. Because of this factor this place is one of the top tourist destinations in Europe.
Tourism is the mainstay of the economy in Andorra and the country offer excellent services such as restaurants, Hotel Centro Andorra , and other tourist activities are in the high class services.

More in Hotel Eurotel Andorra

Solar power

Sunlight can be converted into electricity using photovoltaic panel , concentrating solar power (CSP) and various experimental technologies. Solar Photovoltaic system has mainly been used to power small and medium sized application, from the calculator powered to single solar cell to off-grid homes powered by photovoltaic array.

At the end of 2008, the world will have avoided the emission of 68,000 tons of CO2 into the atmosphere. Investing in Solar energy not only means of making money in highly profitable way, it is also signifies in investing in health, in the future and respecting nature

Spanish Cuisines


The country’s cuisines are consisting of variety of dishes which stem from differences in geography, culture and climate. It is heavily influenced by seafood available from the water that surrounds the country, and reflects the country’s deep maritime roots.

Restaurantes España or Spanish restaurants are serving the different Spanish food with the reflection of the Spanish traditions. Spain’s extensive history with many cultural influences has led to an array of unique cuisines with literally thousands of recipes and flavor. It is also renowned for its health benefits and fresh ingredients.

Madrid cuisines is a combination of art of cooking of La Mancha and Castile but adjusted especially to the needs and the character of the capital. Restaurantes Madrid is serving the Madrid primarily to display the tradition and art of the city.

Spanish cuisines and recipes are the mark of the extensive cultural influence of the country and it reflects the traditions of Spanish people and the rich edible source of the Spain.

World Energy


There is one thing that we can all agree: the world energy reserves are not unlimited. Yes, it’s true! But not that strictly true, there is a near unlimited supply of energy that coming from the sun. using ???????????? ????????? or Photovoltaic panel are currently used of some countries but unfortunately some countries are never heard of using Solar power devices. Information about global warming and those solutions we need to respond, shall we say it is already spread to the world but the drive is enough to be heard? Most of the people know what solar power is, but how to use panneau solaire or solar power are still in the question. The solution is from within peoples will, no need to become engineer first to become helpful.

The Basque City


Info: It is located at the North of Spain, bordering the Atlantic Ocean and France. It is defined as an autonomous community of three provinces within Spain, and culturally including a fourth province and a small portion of France…
Cities:
Bilbao
Vitoria
San Sebastian
Hondarriba

Provinces:
Alava
Guipuzcoa
Viscaya

Basque City is one of the top gastronomic destinations with a vital gourmet center of San Sebastian, Hondarribia and Bilbao.

Bilbao, the capital of Viscaya in the county, with the nice weather and climate that is milder than in most other parts of the peninsula, rarely falling below freezing in winter or rising above 35 degree C in summer.

One of the best features of this place is the collection of Museums that exhibit the artifacts that well preserved for thousands of year the history of the City and Spain As a whole.

Guggenheim Museum
Museo de Bellas Artes
Basque Museum
La Ría Maritime Museum
Museo Taurino (Bullfighting Museum)
Museo Diocesano de Arte Sacro (Museum of Sacred Art)
Museo de Reproducciones Artísticas (Museum of Artistic Reproductions)

With the nice tourist services in the place such as tourist guide, accommodation and transportation is more convenient a tourist-friendly place. Hoteles en Bilbao, Restaurantes Bilbao , Bilbao car hire and other tourist services are one of the economic sources of the city.

MBA Career Paths

Any position shooting for a power seat can be found in a career landed by MBAs. But the ones who are driving the bus in the MBA directory are those in the entertainment industry. A balanced and organized life is obviously a must attitude in order to achieve a comfortable nook inside workplace. This is the side of the ladder where decisions are made quickly and impulsively.

The people in the business development are always fortunate for they work closely with mixing between creative and financial worlds and with dealing stuffs where the deal-making is obviously beyond the component of the person responsible for the job. They help manage the financial strategy, business plan and other miscellaneous dimensions. It is a cross position being in a business development, you have to consider not only what is going on in your business industry but also what’s going on in others’ business industry status. The economy is always a first-hand consideration for through it can a long term strategy be determined to how it can grow out of a financial decision that had to be made in a heartbeat. MBA people take the strategic approach of what is best for the business overall. On the other hand, some MBAs career paths now twisted to a difference, quite a number while on MBA search status are now landing jobs on marketing instead of managing. However, this is indirectly relative since the business world has realized that solid marketing programs drives value, and that companies can no longer make fundamental strategy decisions without truly understanding how to market a product. As a result of interactive media such as blogs, consumers have started to play a larger role in shaping brands and developing new products. Today's business challenges industry consolidation and the quest for company growth and the emergence of new technologies that make marketers even more valuable.

White Wedding – What to wear


From little to girl to women, they are laid about dreaming of marrying prince charming, looking gorgeous, a not everyday dress like royalty and be a center of attention. And of course with this important purchase, every woman must go shopping armed with advice.
Believe it, white wasn’t always a traditional color for getting married in. White Robe de Mariée (wedding dress) is something we are used instinctively today. It is symbolized with the virtue of the women and to just carry on the tradition.

Choosing a weeding dress is not always like a fairy tales, it is also a matter of selecting wisely considering the budget to spend. Mariage Vert or weeding accessories are quite pain in the pocket if you are in average budget. Of course, these not ruining the mode of the Bride, fairy tales must be continue. Styling Produkte (styling product) is a big help to make the white weeding become fairy tales.

The important is how the weeding becomes inspiration to the people around the couple. Elegant, royal, fairy tales like weeding is not easy to ask, just don’t forget, be yourself.
